title: How to get a download link to a Microsoft Office for free - Quora

response.answer_text: The full suite of microsoft office is a paid application but in case you want to buy one just use the online version of Office 365 . Office 365 Login | Microsoft Office It comes with all the major apps required for office and home use . Just don’t go for all the KMS activator stuff. They mess up the System Registry quite bad , and more than often can even contain viruses. If you prefer to use an offline office version just use the several free alternatives : WPS office : Free Office Download (Word, Spreadsheets,Presentation, PDF, Templates) for PC & Mobile, Alternative to MS Office This one is a brilliant application , comes complete with a pdf viewer & editor . I haven’t looked back towards Microsoft office since using this one. The UI is streamlined and influenced from MS officeLibre Office : LibreOffice - Free Office Suite - Based on OpenOffice - Compatible with Microsoft This is an open-source alternative that comes without any advertisement or push to buy the premium version . The icons look a little outdated , but that again can be fixed with a set of icon packs that are made by the libre office community. Almost all features of Microsoft Office are present here .

You can’t get MS Office for free. You can use the online tools for free. You can choose to use Google Suite or LibreOffice for free, but you have to pay for MS Office. Once you have paid for the key, you can download the products at the links provided in Martijn’s answer.
